result.title: Proving Correctness of solution.
result.content: Hi, I wanted to know what/ where should i learn the techniques from proving my solutions, correctness. I have seen this being done in a lot editorials recently i have become intrested in this also. Being more specific proving greedy solution would work or dp solution would work. Also, sometimes i have seen that people point specific test_cases for disproving a specific solution won't work. I wanted to know how to you guys come up with such test_cases.
